item.title: Class and Objects in C++
item.description: 1. Class A class is a template(prototype) for the object. class is collection of data and its functions/methods Related videos link -- -- -- Syntax: class ClassName { // body of class access_specifier: // data // methods / functions }; (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Example: class Rectangle { public: // data members double length; double width; // functions / methods double getArea() { return length * width; } }; 2.
